posts.post_title: FS: Large Lot of Lower Grade T201 Mecca Double Folders **ALL SOLD**
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T201 Mecca Double Folder cards for sale.  These are all lower grade cards, but most present well on both sides.

**ALL CARDS SOLD...THANK YOU**

Abstein/Butler - $25
Barrett/McGlynn - $25
Blair/Hartzell - $25
Clarke (HOF)/Byrne - $50
Cicotte/Thoney - $35 (large tear up bottom center of card) 
Coombs/Thomas - $25
Donovan/Stroud - $20 (punch holes) 
Downs/Odwell - $25
Doyle/Meyers - $25
Dygert/Seymour - $25
Foster/Ward - $25
Gibson/Leach - $20 
Grant/McLean - $20
Lobert/Moore - $25 
Stovall/Turner - $25 
Williams/Woodruff - $25

Please add $3 shipping for 1-2 cards. For 3 or more, I will cover shipping. Prices listed are net to me, via any payment method you prefer. Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to purchase any cards or with any questions. Thanks for looking!
I will take Donovan, Turner, Lobert Cicotte and Gibson
They are all yours, Larry!  I sent you a PM with more info.  Thanks very much!
